artist: Artist: Jordan Crane , et al.; Publisher: Desert Island, New York
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose folded leaves of newsprint, with a mostly yellow and red illustration, with green and blue-gray details, of a woman stepping out of the driver's side of a car, while a passenger seated shotgun reads a newspaper, with the title in negative space alng the bottom; 32 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Smoke Signal, No. 7
